Description:
1 x improvement notice - IN/7LAS220315/01 (312363873) - you have not made and given effect to appropriate arrangements for monitoring and maintaining the quality of your metal working fluid, a substance hazardous to health, in that you have not implemented a system for managing fluid quality

1 x improvement notice - IN/7LAS220315/02 (312363906) - the local exhaust ventilation system in your workshop which is provided for the control of solder fume which is a substance hazardous to health has not been thoroughly examined and tested within the previous 14 months
